  • Method Details

    • canBuy

      public boolean canBuy​(java.util.ArrayList<ResourceContainer> cardPrice)
      Tells the controller if the user has selected the right quantity of resources in order to buy one development card
      Parameters:
      cardPrice - contains the card's price (it's a list of resourceContainer)
      Returns:
      true if the selected resources are equals to the card's price

    • buy

      public boolean buy()
      Called when canBuy() returns true
      Subtracts all buffers from all the deposits and the vault in order to buy one development card
      Returns:
      true if the subtraction is successful

    • addDepositBuffer

      private void addDepositBuffer​(java.util.HashMap<ResourceType,​ResourceContainer> bufferMap)
      The method adds the buffers from each DepositSlot in Deposit
      If the element is already present in the HashMap it simply adds the qty, otherwise it creates a new element in the HashMap

    • addVaultBuffer

      private void addVaultBuffer​(java.util.HashMap<ResourceType,​ResourceContainer> bufferMapInput)
      The method adds the buffers from Vault
      If the element is already present in the HashMap it simply adds the qty, otherwise it creates a new element in the HashMap

    • insertBoughtCard

      public boolean insertBoughtCard​(ProductionSlot productionSlot, DevelopmentCard boughtCard)
      Inserts the just bought card into the selected production slot
      Parameters:
      productionSlot - is selected by the user
      boughtCard - is the card bought by the user
      Returns:
      true if the insert is successful

    • fillProductionBuffers

      public boolean fillProductionBuffers​(java.util.ArrayList<ProductionSlot> selectedProductionCard)
      Puts all the resources needed to activate the selected production slots and all the resources produced by those slots into two buffers
      Parameters:
      selectedProductionCard - is the list of the cards selected by the user

    • fillProductionBuffers

      public boolean fillProductionBuffers​(ProductionSlot selectedProductionCard)
      Puts all the resources needed to activate the selected production slot and all the resources produced by that slot into two buffers
      Called if the controller checks one slot a a time
      Parameters:
      selectedProductionCard - is the selected card

    • hasEnoughResourcesForProduction

      public boolean hasEnoughResourcesForProduction()
      Checks if the user has enough resources altogether before the user starts to selected them (vault + deposit) in order to activate the production
      Returns:
      true if he has enough total resources

    • canProduce

      public boolean canProduce​(java.util.ArrayList<ResourceContainer> selectedResources) throws NotEnoughResources, DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded
      Tells the controller if the user has selected the right quantity of resources in order to produce the activated production cards
      Parameters:
      selectedResources - contains all the selected resources by the user (i.e. 3 Stones from Vault, 1 Gold from Deposit 1)
      Returns:
      true if the selected resources are equals to the input resources needed to produce
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResources - if there are missing resources
      DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded - if the user selected too many resources

    • canProduce

      public boolean canProduce() throws NotEnoughResources, DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded
      Tells the controller if the user has selected the right quantity of resources in order to produce the activated production cards
      Returns:
      True if the selected resources are equals to the input resources needed to produce
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResources - if there are missing resources
      DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded - if the user selected too many resources

    • produce

      public boolean produce()
      Execute the production of the selected cards
      Adds to the current player's vault the output resources
      Returns:
      true if the production is completed without problems

    • clearAllBuffers

      public boolean clearAllBuffers()
      Clears all the deposits' and vault's buffers when everything goes right

    • emptyBuffers

      public boolean emptyBuffers()
      Clears all the buffers when the selected resources are wrong and we have to cancel the payment

    • victoryConditions

      public boolean victoryConditions()
      Calls the notifyEndGame() when:
      -The current Player buys his seventh development card (Standard Rules)
      -The current Player buys his [totalDevCardsForWinning] development card (Custom Rules)

    • hasEnoughResources

      public boolean hasEnoughResources​(ResourceContainer requested)
      Uses the current quantity of the single requested ResourceContainer (sum of deposit and vault)
      Returns:
      true if the user has enough resources

    • hasEnoughResources

      public boolean hasEnoughResources​(java.util.ArrayList<ResourceContainer> requested)
      Uses the current quantity of the requested ArrayList of resources (sum of deposit and vault)
      Returns:
      true if the user has enough resources

    • hasEnoughResources

      public boolean hasEnoughResources​(java.util.HashMap<ResourceType,​ResourceContainer> requested)
      Parameters:
      requested - is the current quantity of overall resources in deposit and vault put into a map
      Returns:
      true if the user has enough resources

    • checkResources

      public int checkResources​(ResourceType requested)
      Returns the current quantity of the requested ResourceType
      Returns:
      the sum of the ResourceType's quantity inside the vault and all the deposits

    • addResourceToDefaultDepositWithDim

      public boolean addResourceToDefaultDepositWithDim​(int dim, ResourceContainer myContainer)
      Adds a resourceContainer to the defaultDeposit with dimension dim

    • addResourceToLeaderDepositNumberX

      public boolean addResourceToLeaderDepositNumberX​(int x, ResourceContainer myContainer)
      Adds a resourceContainer to the depositLeader number x.
      We take the depositLeaderSpace from the arrayList of all depositSlots and skip past the non-leader ones.

      public DepositSlot getLeaderDepositNumberX​(int x)
      Returns to the depositLeader number x.
      We take the depositLeaderSpace from the arrayList of all depositSlots and skip past the non-leader ones.
